price: A fi ìmísí ránṣẹ́ sí (Ànábì) Mūsā pé: “Mú àwọn ẹrúsìn Mi rìn ní òru (nítorí pé), dájúdájú wọn yóò lépa yín.”
arabic: ۞ وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنۡ أَسۡرِ بِعِبَادِيٓ إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-awḥaynā ilā mūsā an asri biʿibādī innakum muttabaʿūna
